mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, ADDRESS, ZIP, BUSINESS_NUM FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = #{Id}
SELECT USER_ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, ADDRESS, ZIP, BUSINESS_NUM FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = #{Id} AND PW = #{password}
SELECT USERID AS VALUE FROM USER
mapper.update: UPDATE USERINFO SET PW = #{pw}, NAME = #{name}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, SEX = #{sex}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ZIP = #{zip} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO (USER_ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, ZIP, REGISTERDATE) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{zip}, SYSDATE)
